title: Pixel 3a corrupted
content:
Android stuck in Recovery. 

After the recent April 2020 security patch, it worked for one day. Then it went into recovery mode with error,
"cannot load android system. Your data may be corrupt....". 

Is there anything I can do and avoid the factory reset ? 

I tried the "adb sideload <image>" command. I have the same issue after loading the latest OTA image from android. 

Please help.
